--- In gladiator@y..., "Deathifier" <storey@t...> wrote:
> Hehe,
> An easy way to fix that is to remove all of a slimes mana when they 
grow and
> make the grow cost significant.
> Also a delay between how often they can grow (say 5-10 secs) would 
work.

I have a different approach to that problem: suppose that an attack 
has more than enough energy to knock the slime down one size, take the 
energy leftover from destorying that size slime and apply it to the 
next size down.  That would make the game more realistic.  
Essentially, it makes the medium size slime a shell around the small 
slime and makes the large size slime a shell around the medium size 
slime.

After an exp level 100 fire elemental should be able to completely 
wipe-out a exp level 1 large slime with 1 blow and not leave any small 
 or medium slime behind.
